entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 10:23 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Overcast. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 10:23 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
